articles.author: Aritz Parra
articles.title: Europe considers new COVID-19 strategy: accepting the virus - Medical Xpress
articles.description: When the coronavirus pandemic was first declared, Spaniards were ordered to stay home for more than three months. For weeks, they were not allowed outside even for exercise. Children were banned from playgrounds, and the economy virtually stopped.
